iti109:2.1: “Seyyathapi, bhikkhave, puriso nadiya sotena ovuyheyya piyarupasatarupena.
iti109:2.2: Tamenam cakkhuma puriso tire thito disva evam vadeyya:
iti109:2.3: ‘kincapi kho tvam, ambho purisa, nadiya sotena ovuyhasi piyarupasatarupena, atthi cettha hettha rahado saumi savatto sagaho sarakkhaso yam tvam, ambho purisa, rahadam papunitva maranam va nigacchasi maranamattam va dukkhan’ti.
iti109:2.4: Atha kho so, bhikkhave, puriso tassa purisassa saddam sutva hatthehi ca padehi ca patisotam vayameyya.
iti109:3.1: Upama kho me ayam, bhikkhave, kata atthassa vinnapanaya.
iti109:4.1: ‘Piyarupam satarupan’ti kho, bhikkhave, channetam ajjhattikanam ayatananam adhivacanam.
iti109:5.1: ‘Hettha rahado’ti kho, bhikkhave, pancannam orambhagiyanam samyojananam adhivacanam.
iti109:10.1: ‘Hatthehi ca padehi ca vayamo’ti kho, bhikkhave, viriyarambhassetam adhivacanam.
iti109:11.1: ‘Cakkhuma puriso tire thito’ti kho, bhikkhave, tathagatassetam adhivacanam arahato sammasambuddhassa”ti.
iti109:13.1: Ayampi attho vutto bhagavata, iti me sutanti.
